name: Name:
noConnectionMessage: Connect to the Internet. Check your network connection.
supportAppTitle: Support with a review our application!

supportAppDescription.line1: Hello, dear BookDesk user! My name is Alexander, I am the author and developer of this application.
supportAppDescription.line2: As you may have noticed, BookDesk is actively developing, but the application needs your support with a review. It will take a couple of minutes of your time.
supportAppDescription.line3: Please rate and write a review on Google Play, this will greatly help the development of BookDesk! Every review and every rating is important. Thank you!
